name: OnPlayerPickUpPickup
description: Called when a player picks up a pickup created with CreatePickup.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that picked up the pickup.

params_body.name: pickupid
params_body.description: The ID of the pickup, returned by CreatePickup.

return_values: It is always called first in gamemode.
related_fn:
CreatePickup: Create a pickup.
 DestroyPickup: Destroy a pickup.
